title: Adrian's Quesada's 'Boleros Psycidelico'  a love letter to psychedelic bolero music
description: The discovery of Los Pasteles Verdes, an experimental Peruvian band from the 1960s, sent Adrian Quesada down a rabbit hole that would, decades later, lead to his new solo album, Boleros Psicodélicos.
itunes:title: Adrian's Quesada's 'Boleros Psycidelico'  a love letter to psychedelic bolero music
itunes:author: Stephen Kallao
itunes:summary: The discovery of Los Pasteles Verdes, an experimental Peruvian band from the 1960s, sent Adrian Quesada down a rabbit hole that would, decades later, lead to his new solo album.
